html_template:
{{Date}}

Dear {{First Name}} {{Last Name}},

On behalf of Nagarathar Sangam of North America, thank you for your recent donation to our organization.

This letter will serve as a tax receipt for your contribution listed below.

Donation Amount: ${{Donation Amount}}

Donation(s) Year: {{Current Year}}

No goods or services were provided in exchange for your contribution.

Nagarathar Sangam of North America is a registered Section 501(c)(3) non-profit organization (EIN #: 22-3974176). For questions regarding this acknowledgment letter, please contact us at treasurer@achi.org.

We truly appreciate your donation and look forward to your continued support of our mission.

Sincerely,

Treasurer, NSNA

(2025-2026 term)
